articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: A guide to iOS 18’s hidden features and smaller updates - TechCrunch
articles.description: We put together a list of some of our favorite under-the-radar features that you might have missed.
articles.content: Apple’s iOS 18 update became available to all users on September 16. Ahead of the release of Apple Intelligence, the most important new features have been the ability to customize icons on the Home S… [+9759 chars]
